text:
Hi all, a reminder this change to FTP is getting rolled out today <https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog/upcoming-sunsets-ftp-folders-and-workflow-log-events>

The templates and modules directories will no longer be in FTP. Please use the `designs` directory that mirrors the folder tree of the Design Manager. The `designs` directory already exists, we are just removing the extra directories which do not mirror the Design Manager.

Hi all, we’re looking for your feedback, whether you actively use our API’s or just occasionally, we want to be transparent and clear.

*How can we improve our API status reporting?*
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/survey/api-status-2019>
